elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} You may pay {1}. If you do: You may return a Spell from your Reserve to your hand.  {H} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: You may have target Character in the Expedition facing me gain [[Asleep]].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: When I go to Reserve from the Expedition zone — You may pay {1}. If you do: Draw a card.  At Dusk — Roll a die. On a 4+: Draw a card.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may discard a Character from your Reserve. If you do: I gain 2 boosts, otherwise I gain 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} Roll a die. On a 4+: Up to one target Character gains [[Asleep]]. You may give it 2 boosts.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If there are three or more base statistics of 0 among Characters you control: I gain 2 boosts, otherwise I gain 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If you have two or more cards in Reserve: I gain 2 boosts.  When I leave the Expedition zone — If you control one or more Landmarks: Target Character in play or in Reserve gains 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: Up to two target Characters in play or in Reserve each gain 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If you control one or more Landmarks: Target Character gains 1 boost.  {R} If your Reserve is empty: [Exhausted Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} []The next Character you play this Afternoon costs {1} less.  At Dusk — If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: You may discard target Permanent.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: [Resupply], otherwise [Exhausted Resupply].  {R} You may pay {1}. If you do: [Sabotage], otherwise you may exhaust target card in Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If your Reserve is empty: You may have target Character gain [[Asleep]].  {H} If you control one or more Landmarks: I gain 2 boosts, otherwise I gain 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: Up to two target Characters in play or in Reserve each gain 1 boost.  When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []Distribute 3 boosts among any Characters in Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: [Sabotage], otherwise you may exhaust target card in Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may put a card from your hand in Reserve. If you do: [Sabotage], otherwise [Resupply].  {H} If there are three or more base statistics of 0 among Characters you control: I gain 2 boosts.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: You may exhaust target card in Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} Roll a die. On a 4+: I gain 2 boosts, otherwise I gain 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If you control a [[Fleeting]] Character: Target Character in play or in Reserve gains 1 boost.  {R} You may pay {1}. If you do: Draw a card, otherwise [Resupply].
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} You may discard a card from your Reserve. If you do: You may exhaust target card in Reserve.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} []You may give target [[Fleeting]] Character 1 boost.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {H} Roll a die. On a 4+: You may have target Character gain [[Asleep]].  When I leave the Expedition zone — Roll a die. On a 4+: Target Character in play or in Reserve gains 2 boosts.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {J} If you control one or more Landmarks: You may return a card from your Reserve to your hand.  When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Boosted]] — []Draw a card.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.
